channel.title: Exodus: World at War
channel.description:
[left][center][center][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/8GBameb.png[/img][/center] A World undergoes total war. Gods at war fighting for power using the races below as weapons to gain power. Saradomin and Zamorak are at each other necks for power. With both gods at war the races below are fighting each other to weaken the enemy. The war has not ended in over a thousand years, both sides weakened and with little to no resources. They must fight for resources and land by raiding the enemy and over whelming them. Each Side has secret abilities that give them the upper hand for a limited of time. This is a time for young heroes to fight for what they believe in and show their true strength and fight the enemy at all c8sts
[center][center][size=14pt] Developers[/size] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/l3QjY.gif[/img]Chase F [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/l3QjY.gif[/img]Brad [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/l3QjY.gif[/img]Drenkai
[size=14pt]Forums Staff[/size] [IMG]http://www.aldalil.com/catsicons/Vbulletin-icon.png[/img][URL=http://"http://www.rune-server.org/members/michael/"]Michael[/URL] [IMG]http://www.aldalil.com/catsicons/Vbulletin-icon.png[/img]Tropic [/center] http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CVqBBF63R6M http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RYm8qArp870
[center][center]Features Lists[/center] [center]Team System: [center]Team Killing system [center]Raid System [center]Controlling land [center]Team Abilities
[center][center]Ability System[/center] [center]Passive Buffs [center]Actions Attacks
[center][center]Clan System[/center] [center]Ranks [center]Inviting players [center][color=green]Saving Current Clan [center]Clan Houses
[center][center]Construction[/center] [center]Player Own Worlds [center]Building Walls [center]Building Furniture [center]House Portal [center]Join Player world
[center][center]Combat[/center] [center]Range and Mage Clipped [center]Barrows Effects 100% [center]Barrows Degrades 45% [center]Chaotic Charges 68% [center]Fixed Combat Triangle
[center][center]Melee[/center] [center]Real Gs Spec [center]Perfect Claw Formula [center]Perfect PvE and PVP Clipping
[center][center]Range[/center] [center]Perfect Range Distance [center]Perfect Range Clipping [center]Perfect Range Formulas [center]Hand Cannon [center]Cystal Bow [center]Perfect dark Bow
[center][center]Magic[/center] [center]Perfect Normal Magic Book 99.99% [center]Perfect Ancients Spell Book [center]Perfect Lunar spell book 85
[center][center]Prayer[/center] [center]Perfect Normal Prayer Formulas [center]Perfect Curses Formulas 95%
[center][center]Cooking[/center] [center]Burning [center]Bakery Cooking (Pies, Cakes, ect)
[center][center]Wood Cutting[/center] [center]Stumps [center]Inferno Adze Effect [center]Nests [center]Multiple Logs per tree (except normal trees)
[center][center]Thieving[/center] [center] exp [center]Various gold collector (meaning it varies) [center]Npc thieving
[center][center]Thieving Mini Game[/center] [center]Able to Steal from Players in mini-game zone [center]Kicking once out of items [center]Instructor Dialogue
[center][center]Quests[/center] [center]Tutorial Quest – 95% complete (“Need to fix Tutorial Island Map Bug”) [center]A World at War pt 1 – Writing Text Still [center][color=yellow]A World at War pt 2 - Writing Text Still[/COLOR]
[center][center]Client[/center] [center]Exp Orb Fixed [center]Money Pouch %100 No Dupes [center]Quick Prayer [center]508 & 634 Gfx [center]525 Maps [center]562 GameFrame
[center][code]Abilities Progress Abilities 6/16/2013 Reflect: Reflects back 50% of your opponents last hit (llike vengeance). Only works on players. 1 min cooldown.
Steadfastness: Take no damage from the next 5 hits. Includes vengeance, reflects, ring of recoil. 2 min cooldown.
Deep Freeze: Does 70% damage with a chance of freezing your opponent for 30 seconds. 45 second cooldown.
Inner Power: Changes into one of four different effects. Red deals 10% more damage, White freezes for 10 seconds, Blue heals 10 HP, Green raises defence by 10 levels. Cooldown 45 seconds.
Death Blow: Does 50% more damage. 10 min cooldown.
Nature's Gift: 50% chance that your next food will heal 2x. 3 min cooldown.
Guthix' Rage: Does 20% more damage on NPCs. On players does 10% more damage, if your HP% is lower than your opponents then you will heal some HP. If your opponent's HP% is higher then you will take some damage. 5 min cooldown.
Lightning Blast: Does 15% more damage. 3 min cooldown.
Ability Store The ability store is now open. Talk to The Lady of the Lake in the Grand Exchange. This shop is in beta so there may be bugs.
Abilities 6/14/2013
The two default passive abilities are done: Divine Embrace Saradomin's side has Divine Embrace. It gives 30% to your defence equipment bonus. For example if I had 90 stab defence bonus, I would have 120 with this ability.
Corrupted Might Zamorak's side has Corrupted Might. It is like Divine Embrace except it gives 10% to offensive equipment bonus.
Regenerate: Restores 10% of your maximum health on your next hit. 30 second cooldown.
Double hit: You will hit two times on your next attack. 5 second cooldown.
Interface The Abilities interface has been changed to hold 6 abilities (not including passive). When you click on an ability the text changes g[/SPOIL]reen, so you know you've selected it. [/code] Abilities Tab and Shop (Work In Progress)
Abilities tab [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Hvm5lIJ.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/3g9RQ.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/tvdgQVI.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/VWuCFS4.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/8g7OgSB.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/3kKyk.jpg[/img][/CENTER]
[center][center][size=14pt]Media[/size]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/QjgCuZE.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/haUXlSg.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/uODUwle.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/OHYn787.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Ik8sC7D.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/230Wdk7.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/yk0MmaQ.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/icaEmO9.gif[/img][/center]\

Ok, I see how you played off of the “Hero” and “Villain” of Immortals Hell. I wish you would have Facebooked me about this man, I would have liked to have been apart of the initial beta.
[/quote]

We actually didn’t play off of anything from Immortals Hell, we just changed the name to Exodus and continued developing. Also there is a beta open right now, so you can try it if you want.

  • Drenkai[/quote]im interested pm me

item.title: Exodus: World at War
item.dc:creator: @Chase_F Chase F
item.description:
@Chase_F wrote:

[quote=“arham 4, post:14, topic:523052”]Try to take for high quality pictures.

This actually is nice. Can you give us a lore of it?[/quote]

I shall try i am not a profession when it comes to videos or pictures.

Lore: Saradomin have been at war with Zamorake since the god wars, They became strong enough to attract all the races on gielinor. The most affect by the influence of the gods are the humans who are in constant battle with one another for the sake of their gods ways. The world has pretty much been tattered and destroyed with little to no resources left on either side. Its the heros of the gods responsibility to rebuild each empire by taking over land and gathering resources to supply their team.

Story: You the Hero has to choose who is your god and who you will fight for. The hero will choose between the two and will have separate quest according to which side you are on each ending will be different and will not be spoiled.

Read full topic
